titles: An enquiry into the constitution, discipline, unity & worship of the primitive church that flourished within the first three hundred years after Christ faithfully collected out of the extant writings of those ages / by an impartial hand.
author: King, Peter King, Lord, 1669-1734.
publisher: Printed for Jonathan Robinson ... and John Wyat ...,
notes: Attributed to Lord Peter King. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Church polity --  History --  Early church, ca. 30-600.
Church history --  Primitive and early church, ca. 30-600.
